Here, we document some of the data and scripts used in producing the charts in the data visualization segments of the Institute. 

## Correlation

Engineering students at 14 institutions persisting to year 4 and graduating by year 6, 1987--2019. 

Data are in the Institute repository data directory at https://github.com/MIDFIELDR/2023-midfield-institute/. With 

```{r}
library(data.table)
data_url <- "https://github.com/MIDFIELDR/2023-midfield-institute/blob/main/data/four-year-six-year.csv"
DT <- fread(data_url)
DT
```
